name: Failover when primary carrier unavailable
description: Verify end-to-end shipment creation and delivery processes for different carriers and shipment types.

steps.name: Given a customer places an order with id "ORD-2001" and destination "Chicago, IL"
And the primary carrier "PrimaryCo" is unavailable
When the system reassigns the shipment to a backup carrier "BackupCo"
Then the shipment should be assigned to "BackupCo"

name: Create and complete a shipment
description: Verify end-to-end shipment creation and delivery processes for different carriers and shipment types.

substeps.name: Given a customer places an order with id "ORD-1001" and destination "New York, NY"
And the system allocates a shipment with carrier "FastShip" and service "Express"
Then the shipment for order "ORD-1001" should be marked as "In Transit"
When the carrier picks up the shipment with tracking "TRK1001"
And the carrier updates the shipment status to "IN_TRANSIT"
Then the shipment for order "ORD-1001" should be marked as "In Transit"

name: Create and complete a shipment
description: Verify end-to-end shipment creation and delivery processes for different carriers and shipment types.

substeps.name: Given a customer places an order with id "ORD-1002" and destination "Los Angeles, CA"
And the system allocates a shipment with carrier "National" and service "Standard"
Then the shipment for order "ORD-1002" should be marked as "Delivered"
When the carrier picks up the shipment with tracking "TRK1002"
And the carrier updates the shipment status to "DELIVERED"
Then the shipment for order "ORD-1002" should be marked as "Delivered"
